titleStmt.title: A letter to a countrey-gentleman, setting forth the cause of the decay and ruin of trade to which is annexed a list of the names of some gentlemen who were members of the last Parliament, and now are (or lately were) in publick employments.
titleStmt.author: G. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
